text: Rafi Cohen (born 21 August 1974) is an Israeli former footballer. ==Honours== *Israeli Premier League (2): **2000–01, 2001–02 *Toto Cup (1): **2002–03 *Israel State Cup (1): **2004 *Liga Alef - Northern Division (1): **2007–08 ==References== ==External links== *Profile at One * Category:1974 births Category:Living people Category:Israeli Jews Category:Jewish footballers Category:Israeli footballers Category:Hapoel Rishon LeZion F.C. players Category:Maccabi Haifa F.C. players Category:Bnei Sakhnin F.C. players Category:Hapoel Acre F.C. players Category:Sektzia Nes Tziona F.C. players Category:Hapoel Bnei Tamra F.C. players Category:Hapoel Umm al-Fahm F.C. players Category:Ahva Arraba F.C. players Category:Hapoel Asi Gilboa F.C. players Category:Liga Leumit players Category:Israeli Premier League players Category:Football players from Tirat Carmel Category:People from Tirat Carmel Category:Association football forwards
title: Rafi Cohen (footballer, born 1974)
